parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current level of ability of a unit, in range between 0 and 1, 1 being the highest level of skill. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''skill''' unitName  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unitName [[skill]] skillName (since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template> or <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template>)</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - Possible values are:
* aimingAccuracy
* aimingShake
* aimingSpeed
* endurance
* spotDistance
* spotTime
* courage
* reloadSpeed
* commanding
* general</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_skill = [[skill]] unit1;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_myCourage = [[player]] [[skill]] "courage"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[skillFinal]], [[setSkill]], [[setUnitAbility]], [[Arma 3 AI Skill]], [[ArmA: AI Combat Modes|AI Combat Modes]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
